text: Rui Machado was the defending champion, but chose to compete in Rome instead. Lu Yen-hsun won in the final 3–6, 7–6(7–4), 6–4, against Rainer Schüttler. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Singles Status Athens Open - Singles 2010 Singles
title: 2010 Status Athens Open – Singles
